com.cigital.insecurepay.dao

Class FileUploadDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cigital.insecurepay.dao.BaseDao
      • com.cigital.insecurepay.dao.FileUploadDao

  • public class FileUploadDao
extends BaseDao
    FileUploadDao extends BaseDao. This class takes the InputStream from the user and stores it into a file with a given fileName.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean saveUploadedFile(java.io.InputStream uploadedInputStream, java.lang.String fileName)
      saveUploadFile is a function that takes the InputStream and fileName and performs write access checks, then passes the InputStream and fileName to writeToFile function.

    • Method Detail

      • saveUploadedFile

        public boolean saveUploadedFile(java.io.InputStream uploadedInputStream,
                                java.lang.String fileName)
        saveUploadFile is a function that takes the InputStream and fileName and performs write access checks, then passes the InputStream and fileName to writeToFile function.
        Parameters:
        uploadedInputStream - Contains the InputStream coming from the user.
        fileName - Contains the file name received from the user.
        Returns:
        Boolean Return a boolean object depending on if the file was successfully saved.
